publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2979# Bill Aitken: Partick Thistle FC-That the Parliament congratulates the management, staff, players and supporters of Partick Thistle FC whose tremendous efforts over the last five years have brought the club back from the verge of extinction and who have seen these efforts result in the club being promoted for the second time in two years, achieving once again the status of a Premier League side and reaching the semi-final of the Scottish Cup, thus ensuring that this well-loved Glasgow institution, which has contributed so much, over many years, has regained its natural place at the top level of Scottish football.
S1M-2979# Partick Thistle FC (lodged on 15 April 2002) Michael Matheson*, Bill Butler*, Stewart Stevenson*
S1M-2979# Partick Thistle FC (lodged on 15 April 2002) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2979# Partick Thistle FC (lodged on 15 April 2002) Mr Keith Harding*, Linda Fabiani*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*

S1M-2979# Bill Aitken: Partick Thistle FC-That the Parliament congratulates the management, staff, players and supporters of Partick Thistle FC whose tremendous efforts over the last five years have brought the club back from the verge of extinction and who have seen these efforts result in the club being promoted for the second time in two years, achieving once again the status of a Premier League side and reaching the semi-final of the Scottish Cup, thus ensuring that this well-loved Glasgow institution, which has contributed so much, over many years, has regained its natural place at the top level of Scottish football. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Bill Butler, Stewart Stevenson, Ms Sandra White, Mr Keith Harding, Linda Fabiani, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2979# Partick Thistle FC (lodged on 15 April 2002) David Mundell*, Murdo Fraser*, Mr David Davidson*, John Young*
S1M-2979# Partick Thistle FC (lodged on 15 April 2002) Alex Johnstone*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*
S1M-2979# Partick Thistle FC (lodged on 15 April 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2979# Partick Thistle FC (lodged on 15 April 2002) Phil Gallie*
S1M-2979# Partick Thistle FC (lodged on 15 April 2002) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-2979# Partick Thistle FC (lodged on 15 April 2002) Mr Michael McMahon*
S1M-2979# Partick Thistle FC (lodged on 15 April 2002) Janis Hughes*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2979# Partick Thistle FC (lodged on 15 April 2002) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S1M-2979# Partick Thistle FC (lodged on 15 April 2002) Mr Brian Monteith*
